phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
HOWEVER, THERE IS TOO LITTLE TIME TO DESCRIBE THE ENTIRE PROCESS
THEREFORE, WE WILL DISCUSS THE COMPLEMANTATION OF THE MIND
OF ONE SINGLE BOY NAMED SHINJI IKARI
I fear that I will disappear.
But I can disappear, because I believe I am unworthy of existence.
I am unwanted, a useless child!
You do not care about me anyway, do you?
Using that excuse is no different than running away.
What you truly fear is failure, is not it?
You fear that you may be hated by others.
You fear acknowledging that weakness, even to yourself.
How can you criticize me when you do the same thing?
We are all basically the same.
That is why we are attempting to become one.
That is why we are attempting to become one.
We will meld with and fill each other.
Mankind cannot live without being surrounded by others.
Although you, yourself, are always unique.
That is why life is hard.
That is why life is sad and empty.
That is why you want affection,
the close physical and mental presence of others.
That is why we wish to become one.
The human soul is made of weak and fragile elements.
The body and mind are made of brittle components as well.
via Instrumentality, Mankind must fill and complement each other.
Because there is no other way to exist.
Maybe I live to find out why I exist.
I do not want anything except to be happy.
Is that why you run away?
Why not run from something that hurts?!
Why must not you run away?
Because escaping from the reality can be painful too.
Even though you are running from something more painful?
As long as you know what the pain is, it can be endured.
Yes, if the pain is too harsh, you can escape it.
If you really hate it, you can still run.
I am tired of running away!
That is because you are aware that running only brings you more pain.
That is because running away can be far worse.
That is why you do not wish to run away.
If I run away, nobody will respect me!
Do not desert me, I am begging you!
There he goes again, doing whatever others tell him to.
That is a sad survival mechanism, is not it?
It is better than being left all alone!
You try to make yourself believe that, do not you?
You are not the only one who gets hurt, Shinji.
You are not the only one.
It is just easier for you to think that is true, is not it?
Once again, you have abandoned all sense of self-worth.
There you go again, saying that you have no worth at all.
Do you believe that by not expecting anything
you will not get hurt either?
Is that how you sustain your pathetic ego,
by asking others to praise you?
You just believe it to be true.
That is why I must pilot Eva.
That is your point of view.
You have been trying to convince yourself
that you are worthless since the beginning.
Not true, you do not have to.
No, you just believe that you must.
I have nothing else to be proud of.
That is why you pilot an Eva?
Piloting Eva gives me an identity, a purpose.
Piloting Eva gives me an identity, a purpose.
I had no value before I became a pilot.
The fact that I pilot an Eva justifies my presence here.
I perceive no value in myself.
I am sorry, but I hate you.
Every person in existence must hate me.
No, that is just what you imagine.
Because you hate yourself, no one respects you.
But they are nice to me.
When I pilot the Eva, they treat me well.
They act as if they like me.
Other people were being nice to me!
Perhaps, both are my true feelings.
So, that is why you pilot Eva?
Otherwise, you could not retain your own identity.
In fact, Eva Unit 01 is a part of yourself, your sense of being.
If you depend only on the Eva,
then the Eva will become your only identifier.
Eva will become your only value.
You, the real you, will be erased from existence.
I had no other value to start with anyway!
I was learning to play the cello, but that did not help me either!
You just did not discipline yourself.
But now that I can pilot the Eva, I must be able to...
No, you may lose your identity, as I have.
You may lose Eva and your self-worth.
I pilot it because it is all I can do.
Dark shadows of gloom hang above me.
This is not how I wish it to be.
The setting sun, the ending of life.
This is not how I wish it to be.
The beginning of another terrible day.
This is not how I wish it was.
Something that fills me with horror.
I do not want it to be this way.
Can I stay next to you?
Do you want to be with your real mother?
Do you want to be with your father?
I am afraid of being hated.
My identity might start to disappear.
What is it that you wish?
What is it that you want?
You are very insecure, are not you?
To become secure, I have to have...
I want to be worth something!
I want to be worth enough to attract the attention of others!
I NEED A REASON TO EXIST
That is something you have to find for yourself.
You have to find your own value for yourself.
THAT IS WHY I PILOT EVA
I have no value without it.
My life is worthless without it.
This is the Shape that let us others recognize me as myself.
It is my symbol for my Self.
Everything is a description, not my real Self.
Everything's a shape, an identifier to let others recognize me as me.
There is little difference between how you interpret yourself
These all are parts of what makes up my Self.
These things are connected through your consciousness.
So, what I think is me, is me.
What I recognize as Self is myself.
But I do not understand my Self.
THAT IS WHY YOU CLOSE YOUR SOUL
The only one who can take care of you
and understand you is you, yourself.
So, you must take care of yourself.
But I still do not understand my Self!
I do not even know what it is that makes me myself!
And the people around the present you.
And the environment that surrounds the present you.
Time continues to flow, and time brings change.
Your world is in a state of constant change.
You are capable of change anytime.
A world with nobody in it?
This is the world of perfect freedom.
A world of perfect freedom, a world in which you have no restrictions.
Yes, this is what it is.
However, this world has nothing in it.
Right, unless you do or think of something.
I do not know what to do or think!
He has no image of Self to orient himself.
It is a world in which there are no obstacles.
This is a world in which you can do anything you wish.
But you are afraid, are not you?
Do not you know what it is that you want to do?
Let me give you a restriction.
Now, you have top and bottom.
But you have lost a degree of your freedom.
Now you must stand on the ground.
But now you feel easier, do not you?
You have less to trouble your mind.
This is happening because you will it to be.
This world with the floor is the only thing around yourself.
But now, you can move around anywhere you wish to within it.
You could even turn the world upside down, if you wanted to.
And the position of your world is not the same either.
It changes with the passage of time.
You can change yourself as well.
What forms your shape is your mind
and its interaction with the world that surrounds you.
You can do anything here, because this is your world.
This is the shape of your reality.
A world where nothing exists but myself.
With only myself, I have nothing to interact with.
It is as if I am here, but not here at all.
It is as if I am slowly fading out of existence.
you cannot truly recognize your own image.
In the act of observing others, you may recognize yourself.
Your image of yourself is restrained
by having to observe the barriers between yourself and others.
And yet, you can not see yourself without the presence of others.
When there are others, I can perceive myself as an individual.
If I am alone, then I will be the same as everything else.
There will be no difference between myself and nothing!
By recognizing the differences between yourself and others,
you establish your identity as yourself.
The very first other person is your mother.
Your mother is a different individual.
Right, I am me and she is she!
But are you really sure that others form my Self?
Man, has it taken you this long to realize that simple fact?!
It is about time you got up.
What the hell does that mean?!
that I went to the trouble of coming to wake you up?
I do not hear any words of gratitude for your oldest childhood friend?!
But let me sleep a little longer.
It is time for you to get up!
I cannot believe you have got one of those!
Asuka's so sweet to come pick him up every morning,
and he does not appreciate it.
Dear, you have to get ready too.
Gosh, you are just like Shinji.
I am the one who gets complaints from Professor Fuyutsuki
if you are late for the meeting.
Cut that out and get ready.
You are such a pain in the ass sometimes, Asuka!
Hey, is not there a new student starting today?
Since this city's going to become the new capital,
there are a lot of people moving in.
It is no wonder we are getting so many new kids.
I wonder what she is like?
I cannot be late for the first day!
Well, it was not really a good look.
I cannot believe that you are the one who has all the luck!
Why did you do that for, Class Rep?!
Suzuhara, just exactly what were you talking about?!
Go change the water in the flower vase right now!
It is sad, is not it?
Are you saying that I am easily manipulated?
I am merely reporting the facts.
Why do you treat me like this?!
It is Miss Misato, our teacher!
Just look at those three stupid stooges!
We have got a new blue-haired babe here to introduce herself!
You are the jerk who was staring at my panties!
Hey, what do you mean by that?!
You are the one who was flashing them at Shinji!
Who are you and why are you defending him?
We are just really good childhood friends!
We are in a class, not a bar!
Hey, this is more entertaining than class!
I want to see how this turns out.
I see, this is another possibility.
This current Self is the same way, it is not my true Self.
I see, I can exist without being an Eva pilot as well!
If you consider that, perhaps this world is not so bad.
Still, even though the reality itself might not be bad,
It is your mind which takes reality and separates it
into what is bad and hateful.
It is only the mind which separates reality from truth.
Your view of reality changes your perception of its nature.
It is all, literally, a matter of perspective.
There are as many truths as there are people.
But there is only one truth that is your truth.
That is the one that is formed
by whatever narrow point of view you choose to view it from.
It is a perception that protects you from the twisted truth.
That is true, and one can have a perspective that is far too small.
But a person can only see things from the perspective they choose.
One must learn to judge all things via the perceived truths
For example, sunny days make you feel good.
Rainy days make you feel gloomy.
If you are told this is so, that is what you will believe to be so.
But you can have fun on a rainy day as well.
Your truth can be changed simply by the way you accept it.
That is how fragile the truth for a human is.
A person's truth is so simple that most ignore it
to concentrate on what they think are deeper truths.
You, for example, are simply unused to what it is to be liked.
to deal with the fear of how others feel about you, so you avoid it.
But do not others hate me?
It is all in your imagination!
One who truly hates himself cannot love.
He cannot place his trust in another.
I am cowardly, sneaky and weak.
Now that you know yourself, you can take care of yourself.
Maybe my life could have a greater value.
I am no more or less than myself!
I want to continue existing in this world!
